definitions.definition: ( of people or behaviour ) Overly bold or self-assertive to the point of being insensitive , tactless or impudent ; shameless .
examples: a brash young businessman; a brash tabloid; a brash sense of humour

definitions.definition: ( of actions ) Overly bold, impetuous or rash .
( of things ) Bold, bright or showy , often in a tasteless way.

main_definition: ( of people or behaviour ) Overly bold or self-assertive to the point of being insensitive , tactless or impudent ; shameless .
secondary_definitions: ( of actions ) Overly bold, impetuous or rash .
( of things ) Bold, bright or showy , often in a tasteless way.

definitions.definition: Brittle (said e.g. of wood or vegetables).

main_definition: ( US , colloquial , dated ) Brittle (said e.g. of wood or vegetables).
